attributes.action: MAKE THE PUBLIC AWARE DISCLOSURE OF EXTRATERRESTRIALS IS REAL AND HAPPENING IN THE USA
attributes.additional_details:
The British people have been lied to for long enough and anyone who discusses the issue of extraterrestrials made a laughing stock by everyone around them through well planned scientific methodology implemented by governments, media and military. Lives have been ruined and people killed to keep the biggest secret in the history of humanity.

Disclosure Main Page - http://www.disclosureproject.org/
Military Witness Statements - http://tinyurl.com/y6pexm
Military Witness Statements - http://tinyurl.com/3vsz5k5
Military Witness Statements - http://tinyurl.com/3dxvu5s
Dan Burisch - http://tinyurl.com/cnxvnjt
Clifford Stone - http://tinyurl.com/cuyvul
Extraterrestrial Contact - http://tinyurl.com/ctk889j
Extraterrestrial Contact - http://tinyurl.com/d67rml9

Now is the time for truth and justice, now is the time for people to be given the truth about life on earth. Now is the time for the truth to set humanity free, secrecy has gone on long enough.
